      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        Initializes elements like the "Choose Quantity" ComboBox once the program starts up.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        location - a URL object required by the interface Initializable.
        resources - a ResourceBundle object required by the interface Initializable.

      • handleAddProductAction

        protected void handleAddProductAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Handles a button click on the "Add Product" button. Takes in user input from the text fields and choice box from the "Product Line" tab and adds the information to the database.
        Parameters:
        event - an ActionEvent object that is fired when the button is clicked.

      • handleRecordProductionAction

        protected void handleRecordProductionAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Handles a button click on the "Record Production" button. Takes in user input from the listview and combo box from the "Record Production" tab and stores it in the production log.
        Parameters:
        event - an ActionEvent object that is fired when the button is clicked.

      • testMultimedia

        public static void testMultimedia()
        Demonstrates the classes that implement MultimediaControl in the console.

      • reverseString

        public java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String pw)
        Reverses a String password. For example, on input "12345Abc", the function returns "cbA54321". This is to be used to reverse the password of an employee for security purposes.
        Parameters:
        pw - a String password to be reversed.
        Returns:
        the reversed String of the password.

      • setupProductLineTable

        public void setupProductLineTable()
        Sets up tbvExistingProducts during the initialization phase.

        public void addToProductionDB(Product product,
                              int quantity)
        Adds the product to the Production Record database.
        Parameters:
        product - the Product to be added to the database.
        quantity - the amount of products to add to the database.
